page.title: 16Place of Work Mickleton
page.content:
The{Heads of Family}of 38 families of children at Mickleton school work,or are based in, the following places: Mickleton 13;Stratford-on-Avon 5; Long Marston 3;Chipping Campden 2;Leaming- ton 2;Evesham,Aston Subedge,Ebrington, Broadway,Weston Subedge,Clifford Cham- bers,Hidcote Bartrim,S Littleton, Coventry,Birmingham,Bretforton,Broom, Gloucester;1 in each. The head of one family was not in work. { { {Numbers of Cars Owned}(same sample families):none-5;one-20;two-11; three-3;four-1.
{Place of Residence:}house or other accommodation (same sample): Rented - 19 Owner occupied - 21
